Module org.panteleyev.freedesktop
Package org.panteleyev.freedesktop.entry

Class ApplicationActionBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.panteleyev.freedesktop.entry.ApplicationActionBuilder
public class ApplicationActionBuilder extends Object
Implements Application Action builder. Methods correspond to Desktop Entry attributes defined in freedesktop.org specification.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationActionBuilder

      public ApplicationActionBuilder(String name)

  • Method Details

    • name

      public ApplicationActionBuilder name(CharSequence name)
      Label that will be shown to the user. Since actions are always shown in the context of a specific application (that is, as a submenu of a launcher), this only needs to be unambiguous within one application and should not include the application name.
      Parameters:
      name - Name value
      Returns:
      this

    • icon

      public ApplicationActionBuilder icon(CharSequence icon)
      Icon to be shown together with the action. If the name is an absolute path, the given file will be used. If the name is not an absolute path, the algorithm described in the Icon Theme Specification will be used to locate the icon. Implementations may choose to ignore it.
      Parameters:
      icon - Icon value
      Returns:
      this

    • exec

      public ApplicationActionBuilder exec(String exec)
      Program to execute for this action, possibly with arguments. See the Exec key for details on how this key works. The Exec key is required if DBusActivatable is not set to true in the main desktop entry group. Even if DBusActivatable is true, Exec should be specified for compatibility with implementations that do not understand DBusActivatable.
      Parameters:
      exec - Exec value
      Returns:
      this

    • build

      public ApplicationAction build()
      Builds ApplicationAction instance.
      Returns:
      ApplicationAction instance
